timeline-items.title: Civilian protection must be at heart of political, military and other efforts in Iraq — UN humanitarian chief
timeline-items.long-desc: The United Nations top official for Iraq today urged continuance of, and support to, the new unity Government’s efforts to push forward reconciliation and security efforts that he said were beginning to succeed in countering the brutal onslaught of terrorist forces.
timeline-items.short-desc: Spate of attacks terrorize civilains in Iraq — HRW
